name: Velcrows
description:
Created for the Game Maker's Tool Kit game jam 2021, by Scruffy and Mantichord, in 48 hours!

You play as a murder of crows made of hook fasteners, and all the tasty crops on the farm are made of felt! Select a crow to aim their flight arc, and swoop down to swipe some snacks! But avoid red felt: velcrows will get stuck to it!
